channel.title: XryzScape v1 release
channel.description:
base: czar 1.2
well here is the dl: [url=http://uppit.com/ZX0UIZ]xryzscape v1[/url]
GUI pic: [img]http://uppit.com/d2/J4Y5JH/dfa3024f088be23bb139b420763089b8/gui.JPG[/img] Clock pic: [img]http://uppit.com/d2/PT6L2Y/3226cfc148659406bda5ca4143b1972a/clock.JPG[/img] Walk through interface text pic: [img]http://uppit.com/d2/G47XKP/7d68292f4abea147c571ed52bec9d6fb/walkthroughi.JPG[/img]
there are some vid on youtube if u search "xryz.ath.cx" its not the same b/c i lost that server do to hard drive fail.
i have a gui, jailing system, some new commands, some noob modifications.
if u leech my work idc since i didnt do much to it. might release on r-server if i do my name is xryz2 lost my pass to xryz
now if you leech my name is a different story so dont leech my name.
credits to reforced for base silabsoft for gui, xml save/change stuff and indirect teachings moparscape for starting me of to programming some guy for jailing idea another some guy for isinarea boolean
idc if u say i/am fail or server sucks or what ever the flame is have i ever flamed u?
my new server is r-s Grahams WL source i have got hard to work at it and hope to get it up an awesome and some client stuff to learn also. After the new server its going to be 508+ server ill be working on.
if it want log u in its b/c it cant find the folders it needs so make them: charactor, moreinfo, savedgames.
sorry had to get to bed try and finish this l8r.
